actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to require that persons 18 years of age and older be treated as adults for the purpose of all law.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the United States and the States shall not make or enforce any law which has the effect of treating as other than an adult any U.S. citizen who is 18 years of age or older.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to require that persons 18 years of age and older be treated as adults for the purpose of all law.
